#summary Reference Values Used in GolfML

= Introduction =

Some elements or attributes are limited to a set of valid values. These values are listed in the XML Schema definition. The page lists elements and attributes limited to a list of valid values together with the possible values and their meaning.

= Elements =

There is currently no element limited to a list of valid value only.

= Attributes =
 
golf-course.amenities.type

golf-course.contact.type

golf-club.type

golf-club.wedge.type

tees-ref.direction
